website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy money box that allows you enough compartments to keep several denominations of bills and change organized.
pros: Has firm hinged clips to secure bills in compartments
Coinage lifts automatically when the box is opened
Clamps make this cash box good for outdoor use
Plenty of room but not too large
cons: The springs holding the bills can be a little more firm than practical

customer_reviews.title: really sturdy and great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, came neatly packaged, no damages, really sturdy and great product ! Super excited to be able to use it for my small business. I was tired of using plastic bags or jars whenever we set up a booth somewhere. Bills fit perfect and there's another compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: No register? No Room? No problem! Perfect fix
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. The change top was a bit hard to open for a while - I thought for a bit I would bend it getting into it but after I slightly adjusted the closure with some pliers it functions great. Size, springs, and lock work great.
customer_reviews.author: wolfiegurl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product- Bought 2 of them!
customer_reviews.text: Great item- I am the PTO Treasurer of my son's school PTO and we have monthly activities and events and since we collect monies during those events and have different stations parents often need change. We also needed something secure enough to hold in the cash. These boxes are very sturdy, many different compartments for bills and coins. It holds the money in nicely and doesn't get messy when you carry it around. They also come with 2 sets of keys which is great in case you misplace one, you have the other on hand. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jarot Bocanegra

customer_reviews.title: Girl Scout cookie sales approved
customer_reviews.text: My girls' troop bought this for their cookie booths. We mostly get bills - very few coins - so the main need was the four slots across the bottom. The first cash box that arrived had a slightly broken coin tray. One of the plastic hinges had snapped. I let the seller know and they immediately sent a new cash box with working hinges. Even with a broken hinge the cash box was functional for the booth - it held the bills and the few coins we received, but some coins spilled out in transit. The replacement box is even better, since the coin tray lid holds everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: KDF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!!
customer_reviews.text: This cash box is very sturdy and heavy duty and feels very well made! All the cash hinges work great and I love that it has a coin tray with a lid, which isn't something most cash boxes like this have. Will easily hold $5k (about what I have in it) in cash in bills of all different kinds. I keep $100 and $50 bills in the rear compartment since there aren't enough individual trays for all bills. Works perfectly and my money is secure! I can definitely recommend for storing and transporting lots of cash or for your small cash business! And yes I paid full price for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I Like how the coin pockets are hinged to lid
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of the cash boxes to use at dinner parties. Keeps bills separate and secure w/ spring arms. ( no worries when the entry door opens or gust of breeze. I Like how the coin pockets are hinged to lid, vs. having to remove coin tray as with the older box that was used. It would have been better, if I could have contacted seller and had both locks keyed the same, but still pleased how these are being used.
customer_reviews.author: Woof

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy easy to open and close perfect size I love it two keys 🔑 included and cable for security for the price is a really good deal fast shipping great seller thanks for this amazing and very useful product
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Rose 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill(s) ;)
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The security of the box isn't really an issue for me, I just keep the key in the lock all the time. I just wanted to have our home money easily ordered. This fits the bill ...er, bills (literally) :)
customer_reviews.author: *BlackhamBunch*

customer_reviews.title: Not so Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Giving 3 out of 5 due to one of the money clips were off place. Fortunately, I decided to check the inside instead of waiting till my Craft Show and able to adjust the clip back in its place. The money box was wrapped very well but evidently wasn’t properly reviewed before wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything but be careful closing it
customer_reviews.text: Nice cash box. The insides are a bit flimsy and the metal bends a bit too much if you close it too fast. Otherwise its perfect. For the price i couldn't find anything else that holds as much with change and bill slots. Comes with two small keys . You really have to twist it to get the lock to move because of how flimsy the metal is. You just have to push everything together until it bends enough for the lever to go in the right place. Could be better made but it works and it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cash box so that I could accept cash at a craft fair I was a vendor at, so I bought this cash box. The quality was great, the finish was good, and all the spring load clamps worked well. They even have to spare springs just in case you break any. The key and locked fit and worked well. The cable was just long enough for me to be able to wrap it around one of the legs of my table and place it on the top corner of my display table. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Veilleux

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this box for use at craft events when there is more than one person working my spot, this way I don't have to divide the cash for making change etc. It is the perfect size, and I love that the coin tray locks closed so i don't have change everywhere when I get to events and set up the box. I will admit since there is usually someone at my area I don't use the keys but to lock it before I leave and unlock it when I arrive. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good cash box for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made and arrived as expected. My only complaint is you need to use both hands to get the money out since the springs are so strong. Also, the metal parts that hold the bills down do not stay up on their own, so again, you need to use both hands. I wish the box was a little heavier as it slides on my counter really easy since the springs are so strong. Hopefully the springs will loosen up over time. My suggestion would be to Velcro it to the counter. I can not do that since I use a table cloth, but would definitely try that if my counter situation changes.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: A great little cash box
customer_reviews.text: I am an indy writer who goes to small geek conventions to sell my book. It occurred to me that I would need a cash box when I sold my novels. So I perused Amazon and discovered this baby. Man, I am so happy I did. First of all, it's really durable. I also love that the cash drawer has six dividers. One for each kind of American bill and one for receipts. I especially liked how the change drawer above has a separate lid so nothing can spill out. Finally, the enameled white pain is tough. I've already dropped the cash box twice and not a scratch on it. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Henry Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice roomy cash box
customer_reviews.text: Nice roomy cash box. The springs to hold down the bills are strong enough that the bills did not blow away in the wind at market. Ample room behind the bills for a calculator, pen, and paper. Plenty of room for coins. Small enough to fit in my 12x12 milk crate that I transport my things to market in.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Please don’t buy this box. I was never emailed back by the company even though it says to strictly email them with any issues. I did contact amazon and they refunded me right away and were very professional about the situation. I had to bust open the box which took a lot. So I thought I followed the instructions perfectly, but now ALL OF MY MONEY is locked in there and it wont open. I did email the company about two days ago and I'm still waiting for a response. I will update my review once they email me back and we get everything taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerkat2442

customer_reviews.title: Decent cash box
customer_reviews.text: I docked it a star for some design flaws. Sometimes the springs fall off on the metal pieces that hold the bills down. and honestly the slots for the bills should be slightly bigger. When there are a lot of bills, they don't fit that well. The cover for the change part doesn't do a great job of sealing the change in - if you tip the box on its side, the change will fall out. But it works well for storing cash at craft shows I like that it came with 2 keys so I can keep one on my keychain in case I forget to grab the other one.
customer_reviews.author: H-books

customer_reviews.title: no security
customer_reviews.text: i liked everything about this box except the fact that the combo lock gave away the combo.... seriously it stopped right onto the code.... as i turned the dial it would stick to the number as it turned by,,,. so anyone could figure out the combo .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Locking Cash Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at festivals & off site functions & it works great. Sturdy springs, & they send extras in the box, so bills are held down nicely. Love the cover for the change - that is a lifesaver. Last one I had was open & we had to sort change every time we used it. This one keeps the change in the correct slots. The locking cable came in handy when one of us had to leave the tent. No one can grab the box without pulling the entire table with them. Price was very reasonable, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best Cashbox Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for cash box that is sturdy, durable and great value of money then look no further this cash box is the best. My mother has her own Indian/Bengali catering service and she need a cash box to save her money and to use when she caters at events. I found this cash box and it had great reviews and I loved the design. I purchased it for her and my mother loves it. I highly recommend this cash box to anyone who wants to save money or use it for upcoming events as a register.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Amin

customer_reviews.title: Old school (yet modern) cashbox
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cashbox with 2 keys & securing cord to limit theft Pros: Comes with 2 keys, cable/ cord to attach to a table preventing someone from taking the cash box, 2 replacement springs in case the springs already installed become damaged or worn Love the clean white finish on the outside Cons: most of this cash box is made very well except for the portion for the coins, but I feel it will do its job well for a long while! Overall, this is a great tool for any cash business or flea market type event!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as intended, and looks great. I didn't know how much I needed the cover over the coins until I had them, and now I can never go back! The only things that bother me are the arms that hold down the cash (they're pretty tight and will snap down if you put them up absentmindedly like I did lol), and I wish the slot above the cash slots (where you'd put checks and such) was bigger. It fits pens and such easily, but notepads, calculators, and some checks don't fit. Would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the box. My only issue is that it does NOT have a latch so you could close it while unlocked to pick it up & move it by the handle. You have to lock it to pick it up. No secondary closing latch. Also, coin lid is very convenient, but feels like it might break (it's plastic) after long term use. BUT I've only had it a week so can't confirm or deny that yet...just my feeling/prediction. Would have been better if metal like rest of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom123

customer_reviews.title: I love this cash box dearly
customer_reviews.text: I love this cash box dearly. Sturdy, very easy to get in and out of, and ample space for bills, change, rolls of coins, square card reader, and some business cards.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cash box for the price. The metal is a nice thick heavy gauge and the cover over the coin tray is perfect for keeping the coins in place. The springs are nice and strong for holding the cash in place as well and it even came with some extra springs just in case. I also liked that it came with a security cable which I wasn't expecting. Overall a great cash box for events and I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Well made but poor design
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and very sturdy in construction but has 2 design features I don't like. When you close the lid it will not latch unless you lock it with the key. I wish it would latch it without using the key. And when you raise the metal retainers that hold the bills in place all the way up they close if you stop holding them. This means it takes 2 hand to add money. I wish in the fully opened position they would stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and exactly what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy about this money box. It comes with extra springs and a security cable you can lock to whatever you need. It is all metal except for the coin compartment which is all plastic. I'm not sure how long the clasp on the coin compartment will last but, time will tell I guess. The lock feels solid and the metal mechanism which locks is thick steal. We are very happy with it and it will serve it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The drawer is solid. The spring loaded clips which hold the bills in place are functional, although mine do not stay in the up right position when I am pulling out bills. I do not use the coin slot feature but the cover was broken at the time of purchase. The drawer has a place for checks behind the bills. I find this to be a helpful feature. All in all, a decent drawer for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Burk

customer_reviews.title: Good, but has one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the locking feature that doesn't require a key, and that works great. The problem is the change compartment. It comes open during transport dumping the change out in the lower compartment. I put a little velcro strap around it for transport, but sometimes forget which is a major hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This arrived just in time for the vendor event that I was working. I liked the fact that my coins are covered and it snaps shut to contain them when transporting the cash box from place to place. It is very sturdy and easy to lock/unlock. The springs for the little levers to hold the cash look like they are on there very well. If you happen to lose one for any reason they sent a few extras as replacements. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlisa Wahtomy-Alba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cash Box for Cash Storage
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this cash box, I realized that it is lighter in weight than I anticipated, which is a positive for me. This cash box is excellent for storing dollar bills and coins. The hinges in the money tray for holding the dollar bills are very sturdy. I highly recommend this cash box to those who are interested in storing their cash in a secure box. This is much, much better than hiding your cash under a mattress. 👍👌👏
customer_reviews.author: GeoLuzSurfer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a second for Girl Scout cookie booths. We like that it doesn’t latch shut- we can leave it unlocked while at the booth and it’s quick/easy to open and close. Our first one has a button latch that is frustrating to open/close often (but nice if you were moving it around often). The edges are a little rough though- didn’t bother me but did my co-leader.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Good configuration compared to other 'portable' cash boxes. I like that space for paper money is on the bottom so access is more stable. It does not open all the way to lay flat, perfect for our foodtruck which has limited space. I do use a cash bag to stash 'surplus' cash, but I expected space to be limited in this portable unit.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to lock but VERY shallow slots
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking and durable lock box BUT the cash compartments are so shallow they don't even hold a stack of 100 one-dollar bills. They get jammed in the springs. The slots are about a half inch too shallow. I like the coin slots with the snap-close lid. I wouldn't buy again because it doesn't hold the cash amount needed without folding bills.
customer_reviews.author: Kevlar702

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cash Box - Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cash box for our office petty cash. What I like the most about this box besides the size and durability, is that it has a lid over the coin compartments. Most of the other cash boxes do not have this feature. Also, only two keys came with the box and we needed more. We reached out to the seller to see how we could get more keys, as you cannot go to a local store and have them made. We received a quick response and they were able to get us additional keys with the numbers off the key in a short amount of time. Would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's made for.
customer_reviews.text: We only used it for one fundraiser so far but it functioned well. It is much better designed than the one we were using. Being able to open and close it as needed without disturbing the contents (bills and coin) was wonderful. It is an inexpensive cash box so we're not expecting it to hold up forever but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: jimjuno

customer_reviews.title: Lock defectives/***update
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get the lock to work. I attempted to contact the seller and they told me to watch a youtube video. Returned. Will likely not purchase from this seller again. ******update*** company contacted me and made it right. I feel it’s only fair to re evaluate my review. Nice lock box. Roomy and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Merodie

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent
customer_reviews.text: The box on the left doesn’t have the slot for the cord that you attach to a stationary object. They look identical other than that. You see I have the cord, but no slot-that makes the purpose of buying this particular box completely unusable. There is no purpose for me to have this box that doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: H Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Worth Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s absolutely perfect for storing away your money and even other small important items as well. It has also includes a 5 column storage for change as well, with a lid the coins don’t fall out. The box has a nice heft and feels and looks sturdy, strong, and well made. I would highly recommend this product to anybody that wants a cheaper alternative to a safe.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Wahlberg

customer_reviews.title: Useful! Many units inside
customer_reviews.text: This box holds a decent amount of stuff and has many compartments for organizing. The lid of the coin compartments is cheap plastic and could have been better and the box could have been a little deeper so the compartment doesn't bump into objects placed in the back slot, but I do use the heck out of this box
customer_reviews.author: Ty Funk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lock and travel with cash box
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great sturdy cash box. the material is strong and durable but not too heavy to travel with. You get plenty of room inside to organize all your bills and coins. It has a handle on the top to carry. The locking mechanism is very easy to set up and i have not had any issues since i set my code. Having a code is much nice than a key, when you have multiple people using it.
customer_reviews.author: IceQx13

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality and return is not easy at all
customer_reviews.text: This box is very cheaply made and it came with the spring not attached which I cannot attach easily. I went to return it and UPS stops at my office and it was going to charge me $11.99 to send it back and the box only cost $22. Ridiculous. I am forced to keep it because it is losing too much money. The closest free location is in Narragansett!! Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great metal lock but cheap plastic coin compartment.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with the plastic coin compartment lid broken. Would have been 5 star if it weren't for the careless manufacturing satisfactory checks; the plastic coin lid is useless now. The container still works and is able to lock just fine. It also has a smooth coat of paint that makes it look solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Good quality. Very roomy. Very sturdy bill holder springs. A little bigger and heavier than I expected but I’ll take it over a cheap bill holder. The only thing that could be improved is the top shelf lid which is made of plastic and a little hard to open so I suspect that will probably break.
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I play music and we will at times have a cover charge depending on the venue. My wife and her bestie run the door and this helps them keep track of the monies as well as keeps them safe. When they want to dance they lock the box, set it in the stage and have some fun before back to business.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love that it tethers easily to a chair or table. It comes with spare springs, in case any wear out, though I don’t see that happening. I love the change area, it doesn’t spill all over.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a box not well protected. Two of the money clips were not attached. And the springs were so loose I see why they clips came unattached. Feels like it was used or poorly made. Only good thin about it was that the coins have a lid so your change won’t go all over the place. But I ended up buying a Sentry one from Walmart for less
customer_reviews.author: strongium90

customer_reviews.title: The lock is too loose to stay in a locked position
customer_reviews.text: The lock is too loose to remain in the locked position. So this doesn’t lock. It wasn’t an imperative thing that it locks so we didn’t return it, but I should have. Why have a locking cash box that won’t lock lol lol? It’s a really pretty blue and it seems sturdy enough. Just won’t lock.
customer_reviews.author: Person A

customer_reviews.title: best little register I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I really like these registers good for small things like yard sales flea markets things like that fireworks tents. I bought a red one a few years back. Hold the money down tight has extra areas I like that and I know whoever buys it will like it also now that it even comes in colors.
customer_reviews.author: Diane V.

customer_reviews.title: Constant use of keys to lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.text: When i opened 1 of 2 of these that i bought the first thing that happened was one of the slots clamps were already broken, i fixed it but it was annoying, but the worst part was opening and closing the box itself and the pointless lid where the change is supposed to go, i couldn't stand having to use the key to lock and unlock the box every time i wanted to use it therefore i returned it. if i were to suggest a major improvement? different design with a Cantilever that temporarily locks and unlocks the box and various colors and an easier to use coin lid would've probably made this box perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Makor

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied! Absolutely worth the PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally shocked at the product considering what I paid. I was expecting some flimsy box with a cheap lock but received something totally different. It locks, great! We received 2 keys, one is on my key chain and the other is on my husbands. It has 4 money slots with strong metal money handles that actually pop close. LOL Not to tight that it could hurt you though. It came with 2 extra coils for the money handles and a plastic cover for the coin slots so the coins don't spill when carrying. I use this at our conference's because people are still paying with cash! I don't regret buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it looks and feels like a very nice cash box. I got the version with a key, and my only issue so far is that there is no way to latch it shut without locking it. The one I had before this (different brand) had a latch you could close whether you were locking it or not, very convenient for moving it around short distances. But it still looks like a very good product, it feels a lot sturdier than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Rune

customer_reviews.title: 100% waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This only closes when you lock it. Meaning, if you just close it, you can't pick it up by the handle unless it is locked otherwise everything will fall out. The slots for the money BARELY fit the bills in them, and if you have more than 10, they start to rip on the spring in the back. Multiple springs popped the first time I used this. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JWoessner

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received my locking cash box on time, however the lock did not work. I tried to program it to my own password and the knob would not turn to engage the locking mechanism after this. I contacted the company and they offered a few troubleshooting tips that did not work. Without hesitation they sent me out a new box. Ben’s customer service was great and hopefully the next box I receive will work better. It’s definitely a sturdy box with lots of compartments for bills, change and anything else you might need to keep locked up.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay G

customer_reviews.title: Great for Garage Sale
customer_reviews.text: My husband insisted on having this for our garage sale. I picked it because you can cover the change to keep it from shifting around when you pick up the box. It worked great for the garage sale and we are keeping it for future sales! We definitely used it more as an organizing tool than security; I wouldn’t really trust this thing to keep your money safe. Too easy to pick up and run.
customer_reviews.author: acaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Durable lightweight portable cashbox-Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a different model cash box that's plastic latch had broken. I knew when using the previous box that having to push that plastic latch button every time to open it would likely lead to an early failure which it did. This new cash box has a metal latch that can be left disengaged with the turn of a knob. Working a farmers market I may open and close this box well over a hundred times each Saturday. After a few weeks usage I now expect this box to outlast the previous plastic latch box by many years.
customer_reviews.author: The Carpenter1

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not without fault
customer_reviews.text: The overall product is very good however, once inside, the coin topper lid broke on my first use. Plastic snap to secure top of coin tray broke after closing. The product still served an important purpose, I just can't carry coins in it or they will be all over the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: dvilchez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price.  Well constructed. Lockable.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, worked for our purposes but I only wish it had an under drawer to put the larger bills into and the top drawer is only for coins. Found the top drawer lid is not always easy to lift. Even so it is lockable and really good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Family

customer_reviews.title: The way it lock is kind of funky
customer_reviews.text: You have to lock the box if you want it to pick up the lock box by the handle. It is a poor procedure. If you just want to move it from one spot to another you have to lock it. So here is what stinks you have to have the key in it or in your pocket all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Nice cash box
customer_reviews.text: Received the cash box today and the first thing I noticed was it was larger than I expected and it felt sturdy and durable. I have owned a cash box in the past than was made of thinner metal and it would dent easily. This feel like a more heavy duty metal. I like that the change compartment can be closed off so I won't have to worry about spillage during transport. The clasp on the change lid does seem a little cheap as it is made from plastic so I hope it will not break easily. All in all the box is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: berlyd

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy, pretty well designed, plenty of room.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lockbox, it has plenty of room, coin tray latches securely, all the claims are pretty accurate. Although it could be sturdier say, by beefing up the hinges and taking the turning of the lock cylinder and outputting it to operate 2 latches, also with a thicker locking piece, but hey, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy STONE

customer_reviews.title: Good cash box
customer_reviews.text: Mine had a bit of a dent, but nothing major and it didn’t effect its usefulness. I like that the change tray has a lid and the White color is kind of an antique, off white. The keys are small, so I have to be careful not to lose them. But overall, it’s just a good box.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine N.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: There was one of the cash holders that was loose, the spring was slightly damaged. Thankfully it came with replacement springs, so I was able to change it out and then it worked fine. Taking away 1 star for their quality assurance fail.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Top Heavy...
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using my new cash box, but quickly discovered that since the coin tray is up top that it becomes top heavy and falls backward unless you have it propped up against something sturdy. Not a great design.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Nook Blog

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for a temporary solution
customer_reviews.text: The coin drawer on this product arrived broken. The coin drawer lid clasps are broken off. This stopped the lid from staying closed. I'm also concerned about the hinges on this box. One is definitely bent. Not so sure it'll last long.
customer_reviews.author: MrsDodge1

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not durable. Problem with the hinges of the metal clips that hold down the cash that cause problems when lifting and putting the clips back down. Metal of the box alone is thin and doesn't feel very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost keys - they replaced free of charge.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. However, I'd lost the keys; and I had money and extra keys for the office in it. Therefore, buying another was out of the question. I just needed the key. When I sent the request via Amazon, Jssmst responded the very next day. Not only that, they said the keys are free; but the shipping would be $20. However, they said they'd waive the $20 shipping for me; and that's what put their rating over the top! There's still someone out there that believes in doing everything they can to please the customer, and that's rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Giba, Secretary/Treasurer, Grand Rapids Federation of Musicians

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It is a good cash box for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cash box, change still spills from top even when covered. But for the price you can’t beat the value
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our PTA use for when we're selling concessions or other items at the school. We lost the only key we had and when I contacted the manufacturer they sent us two keys at no charge and even waved the shipping fee for us. They were so amazing and how they helped us and how they handled everything and I am so appreciative and could not say enough about their awesome customer service! We are definitely going to buy a second lock box and it will be a duplicate of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my purchase! Very affordable yet durable! I love the fact the the change slots has a cover for safe travel! The only thing I wish, is that it had a key entry as well! Other than that it’s great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nun_like_me

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I have a micro business where I sell at craft fairs and other events and this box is perfect for that use. It’s large enough to hold my credit card reader and accessories and heavy enough to prevent casual theft, which has happened to us before... we used a shoe box that the thief walked away with while I was busy with another customer. With this box, I can use the handle to secure the box with a leash to the table to prevent a repeat. Plus it locks. I would recommend this product to others who need a nice, sturdy cash box.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Cash Box
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT REVIEW: I needed a cash box that was sturdy, secure, professional and easy to transport on business events and while on the move. This cash box was exactly what I wanted in a cash box. CUSTOMER SERVICE: Having worked as a Customer Service Specialist for several years I personally hold C.S as TOP PRIORITY and Jssmst has exceeded even my expectation with timely replies, clarification, going above and beyond in every sense of the word. CONCLUSION: I would definitely recommend this cash box to anyone in the market & I would purchase their products again. ** I was not paid to write this review and I purchased this product with my own money :)
customer_reviews.author: Faye Jones

customer_reviews.title: i'm so glad i bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric register for years but when they quit working, its hard to figure out how to get the drawer open to get your funds out lol, so I decided to try this and i'm so glad I did! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: rawbi lambrusco

customer_reviews.title: Great cash box, especially for outside
customer_reviews.text: As a band booster organization, we often are selling items outside at events, and this box is great with the lid for the coins and the tight spring holders for the bills. I would highly recommend this box! We purchased 2, and it was really nice to know that each box has a specific key for security.
customer_reviews.author: Musicmouse33

customer_reviews.title: It works, but some of the time lock catches...
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok lock box. I used it for a craft show and it held 1000+ dollars safely, but the lock catches quite often making it hard to open or lock back up. Wouldn't buy again unless the seller fixes the damaged lock system.
customer_reviews.author: Musicgeek21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Household Cash
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy, all metal construction. I suspect it could easily survive a fall down the stairs. We use this to organize household cash for kid's chores, fundraising visits and other activities. Very handy and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: RickZ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for a fundraiser. FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR SETTING THE CODE! I set the code for the first one fine but for the second one I missed a step and was not able to open it! I did email the owner and they were able to help. Now that the fundraiser is over, I am using it for my personal purposes.
customer_reviews.author: BoohunLOVE

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the box. Feels sturdy, but combination lock does not feel that sturdy. Maybe because it has a plastic knob and other plastic components with metal. I guess we will see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: MommaSam

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: I use it regularly, only complaint I have is the metal things that sit on the money, (I don’t know what they’re called) when you lift them up they don’t stay up and slam down. Other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cash Box
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this to replace my older cash box. I expected to have very similar one but this is even better. The coins box is great with cover. Easily locked and unlocked. If you need one, strongly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Serdar

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my son who does shows because the one he was using didn't hold down cash. So, when wind came by, it was a disaster. This one locks, can be anchored, holds the money down, has change holder and another storage spot for business cards and things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t take cash out quickly!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to take cash out or put in quickly! If you are a vendor using this and need quick access to make change this is a no go. The slots for the bills are a tad short so you have to be exact when placing money. Also, no easy ways to slide out bills.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blue box
customer_reviews.text: Well made box with good innards. Each slot has a well designed spring loaded bill holder and a change storage area. I was not disappointed, I received what I wanted and expected in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, nice and sturdy. The lock is easy to work not stiff or loose which I have had in other products similar to this one. I also contacted the company for duplicate keys and they were so easy to work with and responded quickly and were very helpful even during the COVID-19 panic and spread. Amazing company.
customer_reviews.author: Connmom

customer_reviews.title: the lock is a little week and the key broke off in key hole
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered it twice. I like the box but the first box I ordered the key broke off in the keyhole within the first year. The second time I ordered it I got the combination cash box. It was only 20 dollars but the key should not have broken off in the keyhole.
customer_reviews.author: peatmoss

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two boxes and both had broken coin tray lids. Unfortunately I needed them for an event so I had to use as is. Boxes were in tact so the breakage could not have been caused by shipping.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly k weishaupt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much when I ordered this, and it's much better quality than expected. The metal is damaged, and painted over, in a couple of places, but I don't care much about that. It's very sturdy and beefy, I was expecting a little tin box.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: 2Nd Time I Am ASKING FOR HELP!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon step it up! The box came broken. The slot to protect the coins from falling over it came broken. I un-boxed it and heard a rattling now the slot wont shut right. I'd really like some help rezolving this issue other that that. It was as described. I posted pictures the day I received the box And, now it is 6/19/20 & I still haven't heard from AMAZON OR JSSMST. Really bad experience overall. I NEED SOME ASSISTANCE ASAP...
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Extra Savings
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and enjoying spending money, when you really shouldn't be, this was a great purchase in trying to save money. This was the case for me at least. I work two jobs and one of my jobs is in hospitality where I often get tipped in cash. I found myself spending the cash I had on hand whenever I could. Having this cash box has really helped in keeping my money safe, organized, and collected in a single vessel. I often forget about it and money continues to grow. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty cash box
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how heavy duty this cash box was! It’s definitely not light and I feel very confident with it. It comes with two keys and two extra springs in case something goes array but I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: M & M

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Corner DENTED and paint Cracked
customer_reviews.text: It's BIG but can hold all of our cash. The lid is secure. The only bad thing is that the corner came DENTED and the paint was CRACKED where it was dented. I'm assuming this happened during shipping. I
customer_reviews.author: missk

customer_reviews.title: Poor purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this cash box. One of the bill holders was skewed and doesn't work right. It's tricky to lock. IT has to be locked to pick it up. The coin area has a latch that takes 2 hands to open. I would suggest you choose a different cashbox.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S. Traub

customer_reviews.title: Broken Plastic change tray when arrived. Missing piece to hold cover in place.
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed my new cash box today and upon doing so I noticed that the change tray has a cover, which would great for moving the box from fundraisers to home for counting. Although, the tray lid and its corresponding Connections are plastic and one side arrived broken. Otherwise, the box meets what I was looking for: locks(easily change combination), hooks money in place and is pretty sturdy (heavier than expected).
customer_reviews.author: JPK

customer_reviews.title: Locked itself
customer_reviews.text: Locked itself when was not supposed to. Had to break to get it open. Now is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Strong and perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was for my mother so she can save her money well staying at my aunt house (I have a cousin who gets stuff that isnt his).... and my mother loves it... she said it was strong and perfect
customer_reviews.author: Liley

customer_reviews.title: Great Money Box
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size to store Business Cash a safe way with the different compartments and the coin area that has a cover. It is light but sturdy and I love that it came in white for easy to spot .
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Olivas-Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Plastic interior came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. The lid inside to cover the change is plastic. The hinges are plastic too. They are broken off. Need this right away so I don’t have time to return. Even if it hadn’t already come broken, don’t think the cover would have lasted long. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jipper21

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice box, locking mechanism works well and smooth, my step son is going to love it, his piggy bank is constantly full so I’m going to give him some more space with this
customer_reviews.author: Anastasios Tziolis

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy gauge sheet metal, lock works smoothly but wouldn't stop a determined person. Really liked the separate top for the change compartment - it fit well, stayed closed at any angle and kept the change in place. It was a good deal and looks like it will stand up to usage for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Louiseo56

customer_reviews.title: Great Box and Amazing Seller!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for craft shows and it works perfect for my needs. The seller is seriously the best I have come across on amazon. They went so far above and beyond what was expected to help me out. Really I could not recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Houze

product_meta.title: Jssmst Large Cash Box with Lock - 2017 New Metal Money Box 100% Safe, 11.8L x 9.5W x 3.5H Inches, Black, SM-CB0501L
feature_bullets: Component: Five separate compartment cantilever tray, Four sturdy spring hinges and partitions help to organize the money
Dimension: 11.8"L x 9.5"W x 3.5"H Inches. Large cash box provides enough space to storage cash, coins, valuable jewelry, watch and so on
Secure & Safe: Jssmst large Money Box is heavy duty, which can be cherished for years. Drop the box on the ground when it's locked, it will not burst open
Available Occasion: Home, Office, Yard Sales, easy to keep cash and coins safe

24-Hour Customer Support: if you have any query on our product after you received it, we sincerely hope you can contact us directly to get the best solution. Any problem can be definitely solved friendly
